message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has tremendous value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. I'm confident that the potential return on investment is significant.  While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price that reflects its exceptional worth.  I'm proposing a price of $2000000.  Consider this a chance to secure a truly valuable asset.  Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
